title: (3130) Soure -
description: Triple service station with free flat illuminated without shadows P for about 30 motorhomes, aside roundpoint and road in SOURE town and aside large garden. Tokens for water and electricity are supposed to get at the Museum or tourist office, both 50m W, free of charge (? 2023-08). Interesting small town to explore, with large water mirrors!

title: (3130-237) Soure - 11 Rua Carreira
description: Huge large flat illuminated parking lot.  Plenty of opportunity to station under trees.  Near a quiet park with wooden benches.  Quiet location and next to grounds with public gym equipment and children's playground. Close by (100 mtr.) bar with large screen tv, billiards, outside.  terrace. Monday morning market!

title: (3105-325) Redinha - 30 Rua do Caeiro
description: Waterpoint next to the road

title: (3130-427) Formigal - 26 Rua 24 de Junho
description: Laundry with 2 washing machines (11 and 20 kg) and 2 dryers.

title: (3105) Arrancada - 33 Rua Principal
description: Village parking, flat ground, quiet and calm on the edge of a stream spring, picnic allowed ...

title: (3105) Pousadas Vedras - Unnamed Road
description: Nice view and very quiet in front of the church and next to the climbing routes

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Large flat parking place near restaurant that is a close, also near road but quiet and calm. Good for stay overnight. Climbing areas and water are close. We stayed here 4 nights without problém.

title: (3105) Pousadas Vedras -
description: Parking at the start of the Vale de Poios hike and the climbing site of the same name Place for 2-3 vans, not very flat.

title: (3105) Pousadas Vedras -
description:
Viewpoint on a mountain. 
Can be quite windy. 
It's fairly flat. 

The last bit of road to get there is just gravel in an ok condition. The entry to that road has quite a bump that will be difficult to get over especially for bigger vehicles.

title: (3130) Soure -
description:
Small parking lot of the Santuari Nossa Sra. do Circulo.
At the top of a hill, with beautiful views.
The sanctuary seems quite abandoned.
Very quiet night. Space for several vehicles.

title: (3105) - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice picnic area with water, sink for washing dishes and grill. Unluckily rather old and dingy. Sleeping is possible only for a van or a small motorhome.

title: (3105) - 215 N237
description: Craft service area with parking, drain, water. Large vehicle with trailer without problem. Calm environment. Attention ⚠ Sunday parking prohibited from 3 am because of the market.

title: (3130) - N341
description: Good sized parking on clay. Next to the beautiful ruins of the Amieira thermal baths, with free thermal pool right next to the parking lot. Available picnic area with 3 tables and benches. Along the beautiful landscape of the rice paddies.

title: (3150) Casmilo - 3150 Rua Barreiro
description: Small friendly place, at the start of the hike "vale das buracas", climbing site nearby. Picnic tables and drinking fountain available.

title: (3150-252) Coimbra - 13 Rua Principal
description: Good for a night quiet not for R.V

title: (3105) - 53 N342
description: Controlled drinking water fountain. The locals come to fill their cans here. Super handy for good free water. No taps, it flows all the time, canisters necessary to fill the vehicle

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Nova - 10 Urbanização Nova de Conímbriga 2
description: Self-service laundromat with parking spaces in front for vans :).  3 dryers available.

title: (3130) Santa Isabel - Unnamed Road
description: Big place. Quite calm. Accessible with all vehicles. Right on the river. Fishing possible, but watch out for the ebb and flow.

title: (3140) Ereira - M601
description: A place where you can rest with some shadows and you will be able to spend the night with security. There is a small river beach with surveillance and 200 meters away, a small cafe. It is located near Montemor-o-Velho where a beautiful castle can be visited. A good alternative to sleep and avoid being too busy at night. No verão, at the end of the week there is the possibility of meeting many people during the day. The service area is on the other side of the river beach.

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Velha - 7 Rua Igreja
description: Church parking lot, fairly quiet area except for the church chime ...

title: () Condeixa-a-Velha - Museu e Ruinas
description: Parking lot of the ruins of Cominbriga. Flat, shaded, several places for coaches available. Quiet night guaranteed. The toilets in the museum are clean (10 am-7pm).

title: (3150-135) Condeixa-a-Nova - C Rua do Mercado
description: Free parking area for regular sized cars but motor homes are welcome if you can fit in. No extra long parking spots or signed parking a for motor homes. The parking has facilities with the possibility of discharging gray water and empty toilet cassette. Free water, tap has no thread. Center within walking distance.

title: (3150-109) Condeixa-a-Nova - 19 Urbanização Quinta Nova
description: Big land park, with lots of space, garden and children's playground and service area close by.

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Nova - 45 Rua do carvalho
description: Washing machines and gas station at an intermarche. The parking lot itself cannot be used for mobile homes due to the height limit of 2.50 m, but there are plenty of free parking spaces on the street around it. Here we also stood with our 6.36m van. The gas station was also cheaper than others in the area.

title: (3100) Pombal - Rua da Benta
description: Picnic area on the site of a spring with small channels that run here and there, with wood oven, multiple barbecues, sinks, large tables, playground for children, stage, toilet relatively clean, lit the night. Possibility to sleep at night, isolated place of houses with large parking very easy access even for large motorhomes.

title: (3140) Montemor-o-Velho - 237 Rua José de Nápoles
description: Nice and big picnic area close to Montemor o-Velho.

name: Fonte da Petra
title: (3105) Fonte da Petra
description: Quiet place, surrounded by nature. Picnic area, barbecues, fountain and toilets nearby.

title: (3140-258) Montemor-o-Velho - 33 Avenida José de Nápoles
description: Huge free parking to visit the very Castelo. Night allowed

title: (3100-389) Pombal - 89 Rua Carlos Alberto de Mota Pinto
title_short: (3100-389) Pombal - 89 Rua Carlos Alberto de Mota Pinto
description: Good place to stay for 1/2 nights. Iluminated, with supermarket and gas station around. Very safe place. Local Police accept motorhome in this place with simpathy.

address.street: 89 Rua Carlos Alberto de Mota Pinto

title: (3140-272) Montemor-o-Velho - 15 Ladeira de São Miguel
description: Parking for the castle.

title: (3100) Pombal - Unnamed Road
description: Ample parking. Near to the train station. From time to time a train passes but it is quite calm.

title: (3100-512) Pombal - 50 Rua José Farinha Portela Fernandes
title_short: (3100-512) Pombal - 50 Rua José Farinha Portela Fernandes
description: Intermarche supermarket gas station with a good price, it has the supermarket next door too.

title: (3150) - Rua Engenheiro Álvaro Costa Alemão Teixeira
title_short: (3150)  - Rua Engenheiro Álvaro Costa Alemão Teixeira
description:
RESERVATION IS OBLIGATORY. CALL or WHATSAPP TO BOOK. Parking space at an olive farm. Park in a quiet valley surrounded by a small river and olive trees. Suitable for children and animals (if yours like ours). Amazing place to visit the ruins of Conimbriga, the caves of Buracas de Casmilo and other walks in the Sico area. Coimbra by car only 15 minutes away (bus stop nearby) Attention: Difficulty for motorhomes over 7m. Since we are farmers and it's a private property we like people in before 9 PM 

Olive Oil tours and tastings available mornings between 09.00/10.00 h

address.street: Rua Engenheiro Álvaro Costa Alemão Teixeira

title: (3140) Santo Varão - 10 Travessa Rua João Girão de Lemos
title_short: (3140) Santo Varão - 10 Travessa Rua João Girão de Lemos
description: Along the free river, we took a break; possibility of putting your feet in the water or fishing.

address.street: 10 Travessa Rua João Girão de Lemos

title: (3040) Cernache -
description: Quiet spot (church chime in the distance), easy access with a van. It works with a 7.60m motorhome but it was a bit tricky. Access from N342 / 347 from the intersection 800m east of the site of the Roman ruins of Conimbriga. You can also park at the spot just above by taking the dirt track in good condition.

name: O Tamanco Camping & Cantina
title: (3105-500) O Tamanco Camping & Cantina
description: Campismo O Tamanco is a stylish and small outpost in central Portugal. Surround yourself with organic vegetable gardens, orchards and a woodland feel! Choose from semi-shaded to sunny pitches for tents, caravans and motorhomes with easy access. Our campsite is spacious, all pitches are spread out in lush greenery and are still supplied with electricity. With the spacious salt-based pool, guinea pigs and chickens, "A Cantina" as a place to eat, drink and lounge by the fireplace, O Tamanco has the right atmosphere for you.       Tamanco Manual -  Each season we bring together like-minded creative individuals through making.   If you are interested in gardening, sustainable food systems or community development: Every Saturday morning Garden Gatherings with Cesar Fonseca.  Meet Tatiana, our Textile Artist and give new life to your worn-out clothing.

title: (3150) Rabaçal - N347-1
description: Dirt road between Zambujal and Rabaçal, some engine noises coming from the main road but possibility of advancing further on impeccable track.

title: (3105) Mata Mourisca - Rua do Lagar
description: Large parking lot with picnic tables and barbecues. Free in February. Probably crowded in spring and summer. Water available.

title: (3100) Pombal - 44 Rua do Castelo
description: Nice, clean and quiet place in park uder the castle. Only toilet.

title: (3230) Rabaçal - N347-1
description: Next to Rabaçal, on a small hill, next to the cemetery. Possibility to buy Rabaçal cheese (ewe-goat) at home.

title: (3100-456) Pombal - 58 Rua da Albergaria dos Doze
title_short: (3100-456) Pombal - 58 Rua da Albergaria dos Doze
description:
Free parking no facilities.

Location is across the tracks from the address listed.

Public Toilets at 300m near the Tennis Club.

title: (3140) Montemor-o-Velho - R. do Miradouro
description: Few parking spaces in the direction of Coimbra, not far from a zoo. No service. Nice view. Carefully because there are some holes. It is next to the road but very quiet and calm at night. Not a single car passed by at night. Just crickets chirping and birds chirping...

title: (3140) Pereira - Unnamed Road
description: Nice to stop

title: (3150) Arzila - 2-7 Rua do Serrado de Baixo
title_short: (3150) Arzila - 2-7 Rua do Serrado de Baixo
description: Small town where you can find great people and a small but quiet place to rest and have a picnic in the nature. Close to this local you have the headquarters of the Grupo Folclórico e Etnográfico de Arzila and the interpretation center of the Arzila's Paul which you must visit.

title: (3100) Pombal - 3 Rua do Rio
description: Parking near a beautiful tree-lined playground for children. Public toilets available. A little further, picnic tables. Nice cycle and walking path nearby.

title: (3100) Pombal - EM531
description: Nice and new picnic place in the middle of nature and adjacent to a "bioparque". Parking spaces, picnic tables and BBQ space are available. Toilets too.

title: (3105-063) - 6 Rua da Fábrica
description: Service area in the Bricomarché car park which seems to be under construction, not operational for the moment but perhaps the following ones will be able to confirm when it will be completed ...

title: (3240) - Unnamed Road
description: Lovely hill top spot at the Outeiro traditional windmills. Gravel approach track and large, fairly flat parking area. No shade. Beautiful views all round. Lots of walking paths around this area.

title: (3090-476) Maiorca - 126 N111
description: Peaceful place, stay night or day

title: (3105) Leiria - 18 Avenida Nossa Senhora da Guia
title_short: (3105) Leiria - 18 Avenida Nossa Senhora da Guia
description: Local to wash and vacuum your Motorhome.

title: (3105) Guia - Rua Fonte do Cabecinho
description: New area in Guia. Parking possible. In Guia mister Neves de têdêcar speaks french and super.

title: (3140) Coïmbre - Rua dos Campos do Mondego
title_short: (3140) Coïmbre - Rua dos Campos do Mondego
description: Ideal place to stay for visits to Coimbra. Absolute peace at night.

title: () - Rua do Ferreiro
description: Large parking in a village with all the comforts. Toilet, store, games, table and water.

title: (3045) Ameal - Unnamed Road
description: 16 kms from Coimbra going towards the coast Flat land with easy access, in a meadow, in mimosas We spent an evening and a night there without seeing anyone Only downside: the noise of the nearby road but it is not hellish

title: (3090) Marinha das Ondas - N109
description: Truck washing station near the main road. Very good service. They also have a small work shop. Washing 20 euro

title: (3090) Figueira da Foz - 25 N111-2
description: Water tap opposite church. Not a fast flow but fits 20 litre container underneath

title: (3090-653) Figueira da Foz - 1 Rua Vidreira
description: Friendly and peaceful wild corner at the water's edge. Possibility to spend a night there.

name: Lagoa do Boi
title: (3105-061) Lagoa do Boi
description:
Private pitch in the middle of nature! Surrounded by eucalyptus and pine forests. Pure peace and relaxation! Distance to the beach with all possibilities 11 km.
Here with us you can enjoy organic products: jams, vegetables
and even made to order: organic wholemeal spelled bread, you won't find that anywhere else in Portugal.
Family atmosphere!

How to get there: Turn off the N109 opposite the Paulcar car dealership. After 100 meters there is a white church, after another 100 meters the first sign is on the left side of the house: LAGOA DO BOI. Follow the road to the level crossing. Immediately after crossing the tracks, turn sharp left (2nd sign: LAGOA DO BOI), follow the course of the road. After about 2 km you will see a white house on the right-hand side. Here you can park and register. Arrival possible until 9 p.m.

Good ride! We are looking forward to your visit! Silvia and Juergen Hellmann

title: (3090-646) Vila Verde - 54 Rua da Serra
description: Nice spot for parking day/night.  no houses around, and great view to tge river and ocean.

title: (3040) Antanhol - 139 Rua do Campo de Tiro
title_short: (3040) Antanhol - 139 Rua do Campo de Tiro
description: Oficina com todos os serviços, desde mecânica a reparação e pintura de chapa, e venda e reparação de todos os acessórios de autocaravanas no, caravanismo e campismo.

title: (3040-559) Antanhol - Rua do adro velho, n30
title_short: (3040-559) Antanhol - Rua do adro velho, n30
description:
Calm, safe, peaceful. Inside a private property, next to the forest.
Possible access to water, electricity, 17meter swimming pool, bathroom (only cold water), kitchen with microwave (but no gas for cooking) table and chairs. 
Animals may be accepted, we have a calm dog that usually is happy having new visitors. But better check first. 

You can check out till 10pm at night. 

Hugs from Portugal

title: (3045) Taveiro - Rua Santa Eufémia
description: About 80 meters off a small quiet road. Flat and in the trees but little shade. Would be a great spot if it weren't for all the rubbish. No services.

title: (3100) Pombal -
description: Parking lot of a wedding party venue. Overnight stays are easily doable, especially during the week. The parking lot is flat and large. Please pay attention to cleanliness and leave no rubbish behind. There are no mobile home facilities here, but it is accessible at all times.

title: (3045-423) Ribeira de Frades - 6 Rua Castanheiros
description: Drinking water point. not possible to fill the tanks, but for bottles or cans, it is no problem. Picnic area on site. No parking space for large vehicles. Except along the street.

title: (3045-448) Taveiro - 16 Beco A
description: Quiet little town. 30 m from the gendarmerie. Bakery and grocery store 50 m. Withdrawal of money. Public toilets.

name: Uxa Paraíso
title: (3230-290) Uxa Paraíso
description: Small, intimate campsite in nature yet just outside of the small historic town of Penela with all its amenities. The easiest way to reach the place is to look for the "Church of Nossa Senhora da Conceiçao" (google maps knows it in Penela) and from there just follow the large blue signs UXA PARAISO all the way to the parking space and come find me at the bar/swimming pool. Also feel free to contact me if you need a little extra push in the last uphill.

title: (3230-263) Penela - 15 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
title_short: (3230-263) Penela - 15 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
description: Good place to spend the night, very quiet and with plenty of parking lots in the area.

title: (3090-461) Figueira da Foz - Unnamed Road
description: Small friendly spot in the middle of the pines, close to the beach, access by 4x4 only, take care to deflate the tires

title: (3090) Lavos -
description: Camping spot, sandy eculyptus forest, be careful as we got stuck in the sand, stick to main path, relaly quiet no one disturbs you, no services

title: () Penela - 11 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
title_short: () Penela - 11 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
description: Large car park close to the village café and restaurant 2 minutes walk, castle with lovely views, petrol station just across the road.

title: (3230-267) Penela - 13 Praça Municipio
description: Quiet level parking lot right next to the castle

title: (3090) Figueira da Foz - 1 Rua da Salmanha
title_short: (3090) Figueira da Foz - 1 Rua da Salmanha
description: Self-service car wash also for larger vehicles. Heights of up to 3m are no problem.

name: Camping Gala São Pedro
title: (3090) Camping Gala São Pedro
description: Camping Gala São Pedro Orbitur Very nice location on a road but you won't notice it. The beach is right next to the campsite. The staff was very friendly. Neat sanitary area. Swimming pool Restaurant Mini market Basketball / tennis court Table tennis Washing machine

title: (3090) Figueira da Foz - Rua Major Humberto Cruz
title_short: (3090) Figueira da Foz - Rua Major Humberto Cruz
description: A small gas station. Filling the German bottle was not a problem.

title: (3045) Taveiro - R. Q.ta do Outeiro
description: Picnic area with grill possibility and parking space on gravel

title: (3045) Ribeira de Frades - 106 Rua Santiago
description: Water fountain ideal for refilling.

title: (3090-898) Figueira da Foz - 68 Rua Doutor Pedro Miguel de Santana Lopes
title_short: (3090-898) Figueira da Foz - 68 Rua Doutor Pedro Miguel de Santana Lopes
description: Laundromat / Lavandaria. Self service with washers and dryers. Easy parking for motorhomes on opposite verge. No charge for parking. Coffee shop next door. Open 07h30 to 23h00. English and Portuguese instructions. One 9kg, one 16kg and one 20kg machine at euro 4.50 / euro 8 / euro 9 for 40 minute wash. Four dryers 17kg each at euro 1 per 10 minutes.

address.street: 68 Rua Doutor Pedro Miguel de Santana Lopes

title: () Costa de Lavos - 12-14 Rua Mestre Cardoso
title_short: () Costa de Lavos - 12-14 Rua Mestre Cardoso
description: Parking space right by the sea (for motorhomes is first half; second is for cars) illuminated at night, with small cafes and good restaurants in town (Pérola do Oceano) as well as 2 small shops for the essentials. Sea restless, beautiful beach. You can get tokens for the water (soft flow; push button often) or electricity (1h) in café “O Duna” (at bottom of car parking, turn right). Baker van by 09h (bread   cakes). Toilets are closed from December, as well also the showers!

title: (3090-751) Figueira da Foz - Rua Engenheiro António Gravato
title_short: (3090-751) Figueira da Foz - Rua Engenheiro António Gravato
description: Nice place to spend the night and barbecue.

title: (3090-707) Figueira da Foz -
description: Small square at the end of a road with a view of the port of Figuera da Foz. Accessible from a road, a little noise from the bridge above, but nice view. No services

title: (3090) Figueira da Foz -
description: Deflate your tyres, lock your diffs, take some water and enjoy your stay on the beach! only for equipped and experienced 4x4!

title: (3090) Lavos - 25 Rua Doutor José Manuel Leite
title_short: (3090) Lavos - 25 Rua Doutor José Manuel Leite
description: Asphalt parking on the beach. Desert off season (Sept / Oct 2021)

title: (3040) Almalaguês -
description:
Very nice and clean parking area for 10-20 MH.  Cross the bridge and you have tables and benches in the shade of trees for a BBQ or picnic. In the back corner there are toilets. 
350m up in the village there is a bar and restaurant.

title: (3090-404) Alhadas - 78 Rua Dolmen das Caniçosas
description: Quiet place near the dolmen ruins.

title: (3090) Costa de lavos - LA Largo Cabeço da Caloira
title_short: (3090) Costa de lavos - LA Largo Cabeço da Caloira
description: Parking on the parking place or on the sand dune with sea view on the edge of small fishing town.

title: (3090) - 3 Rua da Arte Branca
description: Parking with views of the beach and Fairly level to park

title: (3090) Lavos - 43 Avenida Mar
description: Nice place almost on the beach. Quiet and perfect for sunset. Free shower directly on the beach.

title: (2425) Bajouca -
description: Service area without the need to deviate from the road. There is a gas station where you can fill up your water for free and right next to it is a restaurant with very clean toilets.

title: (3090-687) Figueira da Foz - 6 Rua Mar
description: Ideal to sleep one night! Free ! Option to shower! It is usually windy, difficult to enjoy the beach!

title: (3090-688) Figueira da Foz - 19 Rua Praia
description: Parking next to the beach. There is plenty of space and it is quiet at night, but there is some movement in the morning. Nearby you can go to a beach bar (open from 11 a.m. to 8 p.m.) to charge your phones. Outside that same bar there are public bathrooms and showers. The place is great for surfing in the morning, since there is a school very close

title: (3090) Figueira da Foz - 19 Rua Cabedelo
description: Big parking lot just next to the beach. Stayed there for 2 nights without anyone complaining. Also suitable for big vehicles. Next surf rental 100m.

title: (3090-740) Figueira da Foz - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near the beach, has a shower to clean your feet, wooden pergola. we spent one night and everything was very good, quiet area, around 9:00 people start arriving at the beach. the only problem is the mosquitoes at night

title: (3080-053) Figueira da Foz - 96 Avenida Saraiva de Carvalho
title_short: (3080-053) Figueira da Foz - 96 Avenida Saraiva de Carvalho
description: Place near the center of Figueira da Foz, very calm and good to spend the night. At the weekend and nights it's free.

title: () Tavarede - Estrada de Mira
description: Free Service, Jumbo Fuel Pump

title: (2425) Bajouca - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice picnic park. There is room to stop the motorhome and spend the night.

title: (3080-897) Figueira da Foz - Rotunda Maria Clara
title_short: (3080-897) Figueira da Foz - Rotunda Maria Clara
description: Continental supermarket. It has laundry and outdoor parking for motorhomes.

title: (3240) Ansião - 2 Rua Manuel Melo
description: Park for small motorhomes

title: (3090-484) Marinha das Ondas - 6 Avenida do Mar
title_short: (3090-484) Marinha das Ondas - 6 Avenida do Mar
description: Free parking by the beach, at the end of the main road, on the left. No service. For those who like to hear the sound of the nearby ocean.

title: (3090) Figueira da Foz - Rua Cabedelo
description: Parking in front of the surfer beach, beach shower, trash can, surf bar just behind, surf school. Very calm, very beautiful sunset, good spot.

title: (3230-347) Santa Eufémia - M558
description: CC service area, within the grounds of the shopping center and service station (Penela Center), paying drinking water, free black water and waste water discharge. No overnight parking.

title: (3090) Figueira da Foz - 6 Rua Cabedelo
description: Several large free parking spaces

title: (3090) Marinha das Ondas -
description: Nice place near the beach, 2 minutes walk. Unfortunately very rubbish. Beware, the road is sometimes very sandy - risk of getting stuck.

title: () Figueira da Foz - 6 Rua Cabedelo
description: Possible to park all the way up to the small pier, the beach is not far

title: (3105) Vermoil - 7 Rua Vale do Fôjo
description: Parking without services, quiet, a stone's throw from the town

title: (3240) Ansião - 7 Avenida Doutor Vítor Faveiro
description: Parque do Mercado…optimal to visit the whole area…sossegado…care for fairs and market days (Saturday)

title: (3080-150) Figueira da Foz - 5 Passeio Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (3080-150) Figueira da Foz - 5 Passeio Infante Dom Henrique
description: Marylav automatic laundry. Clean, 3 washing machines, tumble dryer of 18 kg  every 10 minutes.

title: (3000-317) Coimbra - 20 Rua Abel Dias Urbano
description: Intermarché with washing machines in the car park. Public toilets inside the supermarket. No water/trash/recycling or any other services here.

title: (3220) Lamas - N341
description: Park for one or two very pleasant nights next to a river beach (Praia Fluvial do Vimieiro). Very beautiful and quiet place. There is a Restaurant by the river.

title: (3080-458) Tavarede - 8 EM596
description: Laundromat in the carpark of E. Leclerc supermarket

title: (3080-012) Figueira da Foz - 20 Rua Doutor Mário Azenha
title_short: (3080-012) Figueira da Foz - 20 Rua Doutor Mário Azenha
description: It is always difficult to go shopping with large mobile homes. There is plenty of space here at Aldi! Thank you Aldi!

name: Parque Autocaravanas Figueira Da Foz
title: (3080) Parque Autocaravanas Figueira Da Foz
description:
Large car park directly on the large beach. In the rear rows there is enough space for all types of motorhomes.
 Parking fees (see fifth photo). Saturday from 08:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. From Saturday noon from 12:00 p.m. to Monday morning 8:00 a.m. no parking fees.
Drainage area for gray and black water. Fresh water tap to fill your water tank (requires a screw connection).
 Lots of nightlights, seems to be reasonably safe.
Walking distance from the main road where you can find all the shops. A few restaurants away with great live music at the time.

address.street: N109/Ecovia do Areal da Figueira da Foz

title: (3080-184) Figueira da Foz - 34 Avenida Doutor Manuel Gaspar de Lemos
title_short: (3080-184) Figueira da Foz - 34 Avenida Doutor Manuel Gaspar de Lemos
description: Great clean laundromat with wifi. A small number of parking spaces up to 7m directly in front of it. Otherwise opposite at Aldi.

address.street: 34 Avenida Doutor Manuel Gaspar de Lemos

title: (3080-086) Figueira da Foz - Av. Espanha
description:
Public parking, payment per hour is required but pretty cheap.
Right next to a Motorhome parking with sinks and spot for black water. Clean toilet and get water.
Perfect to stay a few days or just sleeping for a night. About a 100 spaces .
Public toilets and showers for free right next to it (in the clock building). The beach area is nice.

Very friendly people and lots of bars, restaurants and coffee options. Touristic town. 
They check this every day. Please pay cause this is a wonderfull almost free spot.

title: (3080-079) Figueira da Foz - 4 Avenida 25 de Abril
title_short: (3080-079) Figueira da Foz - 4 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Shower / toilet clean, looks like you would have to pay something (open at 23:00) - by the tower below

title: (3080-086) Figueira da Foz - 21 Avenida 25 de Abril
title_short: (3080-086) Figueira da Foz - 21 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Free parking on the street. Just outside the gray area. Free shower. Across from pasteleria and restaurants.

title: (3080) Parque Municipal de Campismo da Figueira da Foz
title_short: (3080) Parque Municipal de Campismo da Figueira da Foz

title: (3040-378) Santa Clara - 5 Rua José Pompeu Aroso
title_short: (3040-378) Santa Clara - 5 Rua José Pompeu Aroso
description: Very quiet shaded car park facing the tennis courts.

title: (3040-262) Coimbra - 124 Rua Mendes dos Remédios
description: Very clean laundry with coffee machine, snacks, magazines and newspapers. You have to exchange bills for coins. It is on a sloping street and has nice views towards the city center

title: (3040) Coimbra - Rua António Gonçalves
description: Parking with several motorhomes. It looks calm. We didn't see it until we noticed that the AA area, next to Inês de Castro avenue, was closed to prohibited traffic to the AA. No amenities.

title: (2425-623) Leiria - 93 Rua Luís Pereira da Costa
title_short: (2425-623) Leiria - 93 Rua Luís Pereira da Costa
description:
Laundry with parking.
wash and dry

title: (3040-252) Coimbra - 23 Rua Feitoria dos Linhos
description: Park and miniature land nearby.

title: (3080) Buarcos -
description: Beach showers. 2 pieces each on the cement blocks marked on the map

title: (3040) Coimbra - Parque do Choupalinho
description: Ideal to leave the vehicle and visit the city. 15 minutes from the university. Nice views. Before it was a caravan area. You can hear the road but it is a quiet place. Ideal to go with children because they can bathe. There is a beach bar next to the yacht club. Close to the living science exploratory center.

title: (3230-114) Espinhal - 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos
title_short: (3230-114) Espinhal - 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos
description: Quiet beautiful place with stream. Very recommended Large parking spot near stream, grass, trees, tables and benches. Next to ExperTree Park with rooftop climb. Stayed for 1 night with another camper, it was very quiet.

address.street: 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos

title: (3080) Quiaios - Autoestrada do Litoral Centro
description: We found this 24/7 service station while we were tired and driving towards Lisbon. We arrived around 22.00 and used their clean bathrooms, charged the phones and bought some water before we slept in the huge parking lot next to the highway.

title: (3040-389) Coimbra - 3 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrade e Silva
title_short: (3040-389) Coimbra - 3 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrade e Silva
description: Parkingspot at a mall. If you need to go shopping, you can park your motorhome here. Be aware, 3.5t max. Not a perfect place, but very busy and safe.

address.street: 3 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrade e Silva

title: (3230-072) Espinhal - 10 Rua Mercado
description: Great place in a olive orchard to stay a night in a quite village .. there is garbage disposal container next to it and public toilets and an outdoor pick- nick table and a bakery close by that is open even on Sunday

title: (3044-250) Coimbra - nº1 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrada e Silva
title_short: (3044-250) Coimbra - nº1 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrada e Silva
description: Parking marked for AC in a shopping center. Room for some 10 BC city center 3.50 in UBER. Safe place there is a camera. Shopping center with all services (bars, restaurants, gas station, shop,... There was A.C in the parking lot above but this one is better.

address.street: nº1 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrada e Silva

title: (3080) Buarcos - 190 Avenida Brasil
description: Public toilet and (cold) shower right on the beach. Very clean. Opening hours ?

title: (3040-193) Coimbra - 99 Avenida da Guarda Inglesa
description: Street parking, about 15 mins to downtown. Also suitable for long mobile homes. Spaces are also often occupied by trucks. No time limit. Caution! Only behind the abs. No stopping parking.

title: (3040-256) Coimbra - Avenida João das Regras
description: It is a paid car park on weekdays. We went in on Friday night and out on Sunday and it was free. It is well located, although noisy on Saturday night. Next to the Ciudad de los Pequenitos, you can cycle along the river and the city by crossing the bridge.

title: (3230-072) Espinhal - 1 Largo Feira
description: Good and quiet place for parking spend the night .. water and public clean toilets near by .. all the locals drink the water from the spring . small super market with the sweetest lady and her dog  just around the corner .. her name is Alice and the dogs name is Boneka .. about the bakery it’s the best corn bread called broa ever just past the church .. and the post office is just across the street will be back if I be near here ..

title: (3040) Coimbra - Avenida Conimbriga
description: Large parking lot on the "side of the road", which necessarily involves a little decibel during the day. -There is a very well-rated snack bar: this place is perfect for eating at noon, as well as for taking an afternoon nap before hitting the road again. - as regards the night: I found it very reassuring (always the same, it's next to the road, but the night was calm)

title: (3080-228) Figueira da Foz - 37 Rua Várzea de Buarcos
title_short: (3080-228) Figueira da Foz - 37 Rua Várzea de Buarcos
description:
Service station at supermarket
estação de serviço, só para despejo de águas sujas. não tem lixo comum, só descarte de reciclados.

title: (3220) Ceira - 5 Quelha dos Louros
description: Parking just outside Coimbra if you want to escape the party noise on the weekend. With the Womo about 10 minutes to the city. Very quiet. Maybe there is a train station here. We were here at the weekend - no trains and almost no traffic. Illuminated.

title: (3140) Bebedouro - EM592
description: Service station with the possibility of loading water through a tap

title: (3105) Carriço - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking lot with places in the shade. Sanitary facilities accessible during the day, picnic tables, garbage cans and a water point. Nice place to spend the day and night.

title: (3080) Buarcos - 56 Largo Buarcos
description: Place to park and spend the night, during the day there is parking to access the beach but in the evening you can park to sleep, there are public toilets and if you want to shower with hot water , everything is very well maintained

title: (3000-175) Coimbra - 72 Avenida Fernão de Magalhães
description: Car park for mobile homes/buses UP TO 2.3 m in height. Very centrally located.

title: (3080-262) Buarcos - 2937 Rua Major Soares Correia
description: Large parking lot, note: there are certain restrictions for campers!

title: (3105) Carriço - Unnamed Road
description: Large dirt car park, on the edge of a large, supervised and wild beach, picnic tables, shaded, open toilets, water points. Calm .

title: (3240) Chão de Couce - Rua Amarela
description:
VL and PL parking with picnic tables and trash can in an industrial zone. No shade but very quiet.
perfect for a stopover

title: (3080) Figueira da Foz - Avenida Infante Dom Pedro
title_short: (3080) Figueira da Foz - Avenida Infante Dom Pedro
description: Parking opposite the beach but on busy road. Ideal for visiting the city and enjoying the beach, but noisy for a night stopover. Large size refrain in season. We will go to sleep elsewhere this evening.

title: (2420) Gracios - Rua da Carvalha
description: Troncão Park. A quiet park with restrooms open during the day. Not for weekends as locals use it extensively for BBQ getaways. Can be noisy. Weekdays would be better.

title: (3000-268) Coimbra - 22 Rua Mário Pais
description: Correct and clean laundry. Several machines of different sizes and dryers. Not possible to pay by card. Only in cash. The manager is friendly. Small bakery / snack bar following the street, "O Moinho Velho" while waiting. Beware of large vehicles, these are small streets with parking lots along and deliveries blocking. So go there on foot preferably from the paid car park behind the Opel dealership, in the main street, which belongs to CONTINENT, a supermarket. No problem for standard size vans. Parkometer in the streets.

title: (3000-239) Coimbra - R. Arco da Traicao
description: Parking for the quiet day

title: (3000-213) Coimbra - Largo Feira dos Estudantes
description: Small flat and quiet car park . The car park is reserved during the day for the church on one side and for the students on the other… thank you for respecting…

title: (3080-289) Buarcos - 10 Rua Rio de Cima
description: Ample free parking, in residential area, next to a school, without prohibition for motorhomes. Asphalted but slightly inclined. Without services, but quiet.

title: (3000-274) Coimbra - 90 Rua Martins de Carvalho
description: It's the market parking. Very well located to visit the city. In 10 minutes you are at the University. Small vehicles only.

name: Parque de campismo de Coimbra
title: (3030-011) Parque de campismo de Coimbra
description: Nice communal campsite. About 20 years old with a great location. 750 pitches with electricity, free wifi at reception. Bus stop in front of the campsite to visit the city.

title: (3080-278) Buarcos - 100 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: Large free parking accessible to all in front of the beach. Places for buses. Garbage. Rather quiet. Sunny By Bus 12m KarasGo

title: (3000-481) Coimbra - 65 Rua Inácio Duarte
description: Park on a Saturday without problem, there is no blue zone or time limit. After walking around the City, I found it the quietest and safest place to leave the van and rest at night. A few minutes from the most central and beautiful streets

title: () Coimbra - Rua do Centro Hipico
description: Very large parking beside a large park (Mata nacional do Choupal). Free to park. Only bins available on this site. We only stayed for a few hours during the day on a Sunday. The place was quiet and would be suitable for overnight stay.   one road (N111-1) coming from town to the carpark has a height limit of 2.3m, so plan your route carefully.

title: (3000-324) Coimbra - 1 Rua Padre Melo
description: Lots of parking spaces next to the street at the cemetery.

title: (3025) Coimbra - N234-1
description: Nice piknic area with tables and chairs. Near a road, so nice for the day to rest a little bit.

title: (3220) Ceira -
description:
Pitches by the river with a beach.
At the beginning of April we were completely alone here for two days, even though it was the weekend. (Most likely busier in summer.)
Great for swimming and fishing.
At the pedestrian bridge there is a trail that leads up.

The driveway is a bit bumpy and there were large puddles, which were not a problem despite the low ground clearance. Turning circle at the end of the path relatively small and sandy - but was easy to do with a 6m van.
Take a look at the path on foot beforehand.
Apart from the parking space at the turning circle, there is plenty of space along the way or next to the bridge. Here, however, the big road is much more present. At the turning circle only perceptible as background noise.

title: (3000-042) Coimbra - 15 Rua Padre António Vieira
description: R. de Tomar - Parking in quiet street, to solve a night. The AC Area was closed for a competition and the rest of the car parks that appeared were small for AC access. Soon he parked another AC just ahead. No problems with neighbors or police. During the night some cars and people passed by talking loudly but we were able to sleep.

title: (3000-271) Coimbra - 36 Avenida Marnoco e Sousa
description: Coimbra viewpoint with lawn area and benches. We stopped to cook something and eat with a view, very quiet. It is likely that nothing will happen to spend the night here. Free.

title: (3000-324) Coimbra - 15 Rua Padre Melo
description: Next to the cemetery, but better than right in front of the cemetery, because in front of the cemetery there is quite a commotion in the morning, flower stalls make a primary school next to it. Here you have a view of the old cemetery and are very quiet.

title: (3230) Fetais - CM1192
description: Nice spot high up in the mountains, with a spectacular open view. Penela is visible straigh in front with Espinhal on the left. Great for a night stay off grid.

title: (3000-108) Coimbra - 155 Rua Cidade de Poitiers
description: Laundry and dogwash. Very practical for washing your laundry and your 4-legged friend! Cash payment (coins only) and coin dispenser on the laundry side. We were lucky enough to be able to park our van on the street (free parking).

title: (3140) Bebedouro - Rua do Apeadeiro do Bebedouro
title_short: (3140) Bebedouro - Rua do Apeadeiro do Bebedouro
description: Farm to stay a night (only on weekends), it is necessary reserve before.

title: (3000-329) Coimbra - Rua Lourenco de Almeida Azevedo
title_short: (3000-329) Coimbra - Rua Lourenco de Almeida Azevedo
description:
Large parking day, fee, and night, free, in the center, flat, next to a public park, ideal for van or van (max 6m) for fairly long spur places. Empty at night, apparently fills up around 8am. Very calm night, I positioned myself long on two places because the carpark is empty before 8h, after it is necessary to be positioned on the spot on the cob or leave to respect the parking.

40.2085635, -8.4158948 
the exact entrance on Google.
it was difficult to find.

title: (3080-455) Buarcos - 13 Rua da Bateira
description: Bom sítio para estacionar , perto da praia. (Good place to park and , near the beach.)

name: Area di sosta camper Miranda do Corvo
title: (3220) Area di sosta camper Miranda do Corvo
title_short: (3220) Area di sosta camper Miranda do Corvo
description: Placed near a roundabout with access to the village, restaurant nearby. Very quiet at night.

title: (2425) Coimbrão - 10 Largo de São Tiago
description: Drinking water point with good pressure

title: (3220) Miranda do Corvo - 34 Rua Doutor Mota Pinto
title_short: (3220) Miranda do Corvo - 34 Rua Doutor Mota Pinto
description: Laundromat, self service laundry. 5 minute walk from the Aire. Clean and good machines, ideally needs 8kg machine. Prices in picture.

title: (3020) Coimbra - 37 Rua Manuel Madeira
description: Place on the outskirts of Coimbra ideal to rest and eat something in the shade of the trees.

title: (3080-377) Buarcos - 30 Rua Infante Dom Henrique
description: Spot Buarcos. a beautiful place, overlooking the beach. There is a mini family market nearby, Feiruça, a pizzeria, an excellent one. pedestrian path. Excellent beach. I advise you.

title: (3060-026) Ançã - 3 Rua Afonso Abelaria
description: excellent place to visit the natural pool of Ançã

title: (2425) - Rua da Lagoa
description: Perfect place. Free, Flat, shadow, small lake, toilet, small ice cream/restaurant. Many RV parking places. Clean

title: (3080) Figueira da Foz -
description: Shaded picnic area of the Capela de Santo Amaro, a few tables with the possibility of parking nearby. Magnificent sunset on the heights with breathtaking views of the coast. Enough space under the trees, otherwise for larger vehicles possibility to park next to the Capela. Many locals come to eat here. Please respect the place.

title: (3230) Ferraria Ferraria de São João - CM1196
title_short: (3230) Ferraria Ferraria de São João - CM1196
description: Mountainbike Funtrail of Ferraria de São João. This is the basecamp of the funtrail complete with picnic tables, hot showers, WC, large trash containers and a paid cleaning station for your bike. The trail looks pretty abandoned, the facilities however were open, proper and working. There's only space for 4 vehicles parked door to door, so I'd say 1 camper staying here is plenty.

title: (3080) Quiaios - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area close to a panoramic view, allowing you to park for the night away from the road and under the pines. Very quiet at the time we stopped there (April). Picnic tables, panoramic view, hiking trail departures.

title: (3080) Quiaios -
description: Very nice view of the lake, possibility to park at the water's edge, there is no one there, only the birds!

title: (3080-008) Figueira da Foz - N109-8
description: Parking with a view. recommend in off season time. parked there one night in November. it was perfect. during the high season mby not as quiet as now. street not as busy as expected.

title: (3080-377) Buarcos - 19 Travessa Farol
description: Spot off downtown, in a dead end (so very little passage), below the road and just above the sea Several small unhooked where to settle in front of the sea with the sound of the waves. Possibility to go down on the beach by several small paths. Spot very calm, a little windy. We stayed here for one night without any worries. No convenience but if you are looking for tranquility, this is the ideal!

title: (3080-008) Figueira da Foz - Est. da Fábrica
title_short: (3080-008) Figueira da Foz - Est. da Fábrica
description: Old entrance to cement factory. Flat site to the right and a bit of nothing to the left. You see the light of the lighthouse. Site on the outskirts of the town but the GNR goes around once in the morning and once in the afternoon. He falls asleep to the sound of the waves.

name: Camping Coimbrão
title: (2425) Camping Coimbrão
description: Camping Coimbrao. 35 pitches, swimming pool etc. Very calm not suitable if turbulent children. Arrivee until 23h(15.6.to 31.8.), departure before 12h

title: (N109-8) Figueira da Foz - Estr. Florestal
description: 6 minutes from town with ocean views. walking distance to the lighthouse.

title: (3030-336) Coimbra - 18b Rua Barca do Mondego
description: Very nice gravel course just a few meters from the river. Some straight spots to park, but unfortunately no shade on the vehicle. The driveway is a bit narrow and has a hairpin bend. With a 6 m van it was still easy to do. Directly at the river some larger trees grow under which you can get shade and go into the water. Only a few minutes walk to a hiking trail and over the bridge is the next Praia Fluvial with a beach bar not far away. Trash cans are available. Internet reception is good.

title: (3080) Quiaios -
description: Nice place to stop and spend the night. A bridge is present on the side for this walk and admire the lake.

title: (3230-103) Louçainha - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place, beautiful landscape, spectacular pools with changing rooms, pic nic area, very nice restaurant !!!

title: (3080) Buarcos - N109-8
description: In a bend, a very busy road, very nice view of the sea and the lighthouse. Place for a van. Slightly sloping

title: (3030-273) Coimbra - 13 Rua Rio
description: Location is very difficult to access for motorhomes. Very nice spot on parking by the river, direct access to a small beach next to a small dam, perfect for this refresh. Snack bar and public toilets with a bonus of two showers (but beware of mosquitoes). Places frequented by families but very quiet at night. Fishy river for lovers of poles. Only hic watering the field next door with group so noise early in the morning, do not park next to the well.

title: (3080) - Unnamed Road
description: Corner called water lilies near the lake. Barbecue access, sumptuous view... Public WC Faucet for dogs? and human

title: (3025) - 109 Rua Coimbra
description: Self service - washhouse! Here is the possibility to wash his own laundry by hand. Clotheslines are hanging in the front yard, so you can dry your laundry afterwards in the sun. A well (no drinking water!) Is also available.

title: (2415) Milagres - Est. Principal
description: Well shaded picnic area with several tables

title: (3080) - Unnamed Road
description: Isolated location at the end of a small street, perfect for one night. By cons avoid Thursday and Saturday because it is hunting day.

title: (3080) - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet spot right on the water. beautiful lake with lots of birds and water lilies.

title: (3080) Quiaios - 12 Rua Marecos do Sul
description: We spent the night in October on this place without passing through a dead end (we only have seen one car in the morning). No service, very quiet place with sound of the ocean behind a very small dune. View of the small mountain, accessible to motorhomes.

name: Parque de Campismo de Quiaios
title: (3080) Parque de Campismo de Quiaios
description: Great place for value for money motorhomes. We were supposed to stay one night, we stayed there for 3 days. - 500 meters from the beach - large pitch - Water, drainage and electricity, no quantity limited in water or to be quantified.

title: (3080-515) Quiaios - 33 Avenida Manuel Bento
description: Large and free parking space on the dunes and the sea. No facilities available. Nice restaurants nearby, such as ''Mar''! A beach bar, Bart, near the car park (open from 10:30 am). Beautiful walks along the dunes also start at the parking lot. We chose this place over the others because there is no prohibition sign here and it is a bit further from the local homes. That way you don't disturb anyone. We stayed there overnight. Very quiet for sleeping.

title: (3220) Ceira -
description: After looking for a quiet place close to Coimbra (we went near the river beach further down, but the parkfornight spots were very noisy with lots of people partying), we finally found this small dirt road, in the Heights. Very calm, that helped us out a lot.

title: (3020-119) Eiras - 8 Travessa Santo António
description: Picnic area with barbecue grill, has a toilet, quiet area with a river next to it

title: (3080-515) Praia de Quiaios - 1E Avenida Manuel Bento
title_short: (3080-515) Praia de Quiaios - 1E Avenida Manuel Bento
description: Spacious parking. Slept peacefully here. pristine beaches. Swimming pool in the summer months

title: () Quiaios - Largo São Pedro
description: Car park a few yards from the beach no services but was very quiet for the high season

title: (3080) Quiaios - Rua António São Parente
description: Nice place for a night

title: (3060) Cantanhede - 1 Rua Vale Mouro
description: Gas station with free drinking water and air

title: (3105) Guia -
description: Nice secluded parking lot where mostly locals go to the beach or also collect white berries (crowberries). When we arrived there was no car at all and total silence. Great access to the sea just a few steps over the dune. Highly Recommended. Since the driveway is very sandy, we recommend small vehicles with all-wheel drive. However, not absolutely necessary.
